text: Ana afi zagama ke'nanana, korapa mani'neana, menina omani'neankino, kofa'a knafi riga omane kerifinti hanatino, eama huteno haviza hugahie. Ama mopama tro'ma osu'negeno, mopafima mani'naza vahe'ma zamagima asimu eri avontafepima kreonte'nea vahe'mo'za, korapa mani'neana, menina omani'neankino, henkama eama'ma hanige'za kesanu'za antri hugahaze.
